title: Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Education Efficiency Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematical concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: For current professionals, improving mastery of job-relevant mathematical concepts and enhancing adaptability to flipped learning.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy through pre-class microlearning content.
Learners achieve over 30% greater self-directed learning efficiency compared to class time by utilizing learning strategies based on cognitive load theory.
Learners improve their understanding of flipped learning-style lessons to 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
